thread.title: R K Coburn
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by R K Coburn

author: R K Coburn
title: R K Coburn
text: My first purchase was for a patio door vertical blind. I was a little sceptical as the price was so cheap! How wrong was that. The blinds are perfect. The measurements exact and they even give you two spare sections. After that I ordered 5 more sets. They are easy to install - just perfect. The delivery was as expected with no delays. I would highly recommend this company to everyone. A very happy customer Mrs R Coburn-Cook. Thank you.
